title: Army emerge overall champions at National Canoeing & Kayaking Competition
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Army participants clinched the overall championship at National Canoeing & Kayaking Competition – 2022 organized by the Sri Lanka Canoeing & Kayaking National Association, that took place at the Diyawanna waters from 3rd to 5th June 2022.

Sri Lanka Army players (male) won 10 Gold medals, 8 Silver Medals and 4 Bronze Medals in the tournament to claim the Championship. Meanwhile, Sri Lanka Army women players grabbing 8 Gold Medals, 2 Silver Medals and 1 Bronze medal won the Championship in the national tournament.
In the recent past years, Army players have won this tournament continuously having achieved championship in all events.
Army emerge overall champions at National Canoeing & Kayaking Competition
Prasanna Ranatunga sentenced to 2-year RI, suspended for five years
Sri Lankan court lifts ban on Aeroflot flight from leaving Sri Lanka.
